name: watskeburt
description: List files changed since a git revision

scripts.depcruise: depcruise bin dist src types --config --output-type err
scripts.depcruise:graph: depcruise bin src types --include-only '^(bin|dist|src|types)' --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | tee docs/dependency-graph.svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > docs/dependency-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:archi: depcruise bin src --include-only '^(bin|dist|src|types)' --config --output-type archi | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > docs/high-level-dependency-graph.html
scripts.depcruise:graph:dev: depcruise bin dist src types --include-only '^(bin|dist|src|types)' --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html | browser
scripts.depcruise:graph:diff:dev: depcruise bin dist src types --include-only '^(bin|dist|src|types)' --highlight "$(node bin/cli.mjs main -T regex)" --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html | browser
scripts.depcruise:graph:diff:mermaid: depcruise bin dist src types --include-only '^(bin|dist|src|types)' --config --output-type mermaid --output-to - --highlight "$(node bin/cli.mjs $SHA -T regex)"
scripts.depcruise:html: depcruise bin src types --progress --config --output-type err-html --output-to dependency-violation-report.html
scripts.lint:eslint: eslint bin src types tools --cache --cache-location node_modules/.cache/eslint/
scripts.lint:eslint:fix: eslint bin src types tools --fix --cache --cache-location node_modules/.cache/eslint/
scripts.version: npm-run-all --sequential clean build lint depcruise:graph scm:stage
